short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Building a more informed electorate through media bias awareness. Name stands for Right, Center, Left

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We can't fix media bias, but we can at least make ourselves aware of it.

RCL stands for Right, Center, Left

* Links are prefixed with a R, C, L when pointing to a new sources with a known bias. Badges are visible in Google Search results, and coming soon to Facebook, Twitter, and other top sites.

* Ratings primarily come from AllSides and are transparently published and open to input from the community.
